yarn over st s = stitch stitches repeat rounds 1-4 of the honeycomb pattern 2 more times for rs = right side ws = wrong side a total of 3 times repeat rounds 1-3 of the honeycomb pattern k2tog = knit the next 2 stitches together knit 2 rounds knit rounds 1-3 of garter band hsk = honeycomb stitch knit pick up the long strand created from the k1 below from the previous row and knit it together change to larger needles knit until hat measures 5 5 from cast with the 1st stitch on the left needle on edge switch to dpns when need while decreasing top of hat hsp = honeycomb purl stitch pick up and place the long strand created from the decrease top of hat k1 below on the previous row on the needle round 1 k10 ctd *k20 ctd repeat from * until 10 sts remain and purl it along with the 1st stitch on the k10 left needle k1 below = insert needle in the stitch round 2 & even rounds knit directly below the stitch on the left needle round 3 k9 ctd *k17 ctd repeat from * until 8 sts remain k8 lifting both the below stitch and the stitch on round 5 k8 ctd *k14 ctd repeat from * until 6 sts remain k6 the needle off round 7 k7 ctd *k11 ctd repeat from * until 4 sts remain k4 ctd = centered
